Html:
Hi,

does anybody has experience  with XUnit together with Prism?

Suggestions welcome

Thanks

Peter

Hi Peter,

There is no official guidance for using Prism with Xunit. However, there should be no obstacles to using it, as Prism isn’t designed to be used with any particular unit testing framework.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
